name: Pattern Recognition
description: Training to recognize recurring gaslighting tactics and identify early warning signs.

cards.title: Recognizing Gaslighting Phrases
cards.description: Common phrases used by gaslighters and how to counter them.
bulletpoints: Identifying dismissive statements meant to create self-doubt.
Recognizing deliberate contradictions used to keep you unbalanced.
Detecting deflection tactics designed to shift blame.

cards.title: Tracking Emotional Manipulation Loops
cards.description: Mapping out gaslighting cycles to predict and neutralize future attacks.
bulletpoints: Recognizing the emotional rollercoaster strategy of alternating praise and criticism.
Understanding how gaslighters exploit inconsistencies in your memory.
Documenting manipulation attempts to expose behavioral patterns.

cards.title: Identifying Weaponized Confusion
cards.description: Learning to recognize when a conversation is being deliberately distorted.
bulletpoints: Spotting when conversations are being reframed to change reality.
Recognizing circular logic traps meant to exhaust and disorient.
Countering the ‘changing the subject’ technique with strategic refocusing.
